tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
My child was in trouble midnight..it was emergency...on recommendation..we called him..his call rang and after sometime he returned back the call....he was in London...still he returned call....though we were not his patient and addressed our child's problem. You can really
really bank on him 24/7 for padeatric problems.

Dr. Rajen Doshi is very helpful and best Dr. ever for children .I don't know why Today Dr. talking very roughly with my Wife and me. we are went for treatment of my 3 years Doughter and he suffers from heavy fever he given best treatment but but I m very disappointed of Dr. behaviour.

********* **** ** * **** ******my kid is 14mnt old was admitted to cuudle hospital bt v wer nt satisfied n v took dama discharge.n later v got medicine bt on 2nd opinion v came to knw dat medicine r nt related to his reports and rajan sir chngd d medicine and he is completely fine aft 1 dose..
